title: Trolls Hate That She's Happy Without Hands | BORN DIFFERENT

media:group.media:title: Trolls Hate That She's Happy Without Hands | BORN DIFFERENT
media:group.media:description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

Chassidy Covarrubias was born with Tetra-Amelia syndrome - a rare congenital disorder that causes the absence or malformation of limbs. For Chassidy, it means she has no hands and short legs. Throughout her life, Chassidy has endured stares and mean comments wherever she goes - but her positive, determined attitude means she doesn’t let it get to her. Educating others about her condition, Chassidy uses social media to share her journey as is often subjected to negative comments/trolling.  Today, we’ll see her reacting to some of the DMs she receives and discussing her most FAQs. 

Follow Chassidy:
https://www.instagram.com/chasing_chassidy/
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GMcIWOcJClE

Videographer: Jason Janik
